Pre-Game Insights: The favored Cardinals have -129 moneyline odds to win against the underdog Rockies, who are listed at +109.
The over/under is 10.5 runs for this contest.
The Cardinals have been favored 76 times and won 40, or 52.6%, of those games.
This season St. Louis has won 23 of its 44 games, or 52.3%, when favored by at least -129 on the moneyline.
The Rockies have been underdogs in 154 games this season and have come away with the win 58 times (37.7%) in those contests.
This year, Colorado has won 56 of 141 games when listed as at least +109 or worse on the moneyline.
